title: Cosmic Cherry Arts Festival
description: An all-inclusive festival celebrating femininity, queerness, and gender expression.
cost: $25 admission includes the show and afterparty (Fri + Sat shows only)

title: Brooklyn Poetry Slam
description: Slam poets gather for a night of words and community.

title: Pancakes + Booze Art Show
description: A pop-up art show with works by local artists, live body painting, music, and all-you-can-eat pancakes.

title: Comedy Ugly: A Comedy Strip Show
description: Comedians reveal more than just punchlines at this standup show.

title: Savage! Comedy Show
description: Standup comedy show featuring various comedians.
cost: Free admission (RSVP for a chance to win a free drink)

title: 14th First Look Film Festival
description: Museum of Moving Image’s annual festival of new and innovative international cinema.

title: 23rd Fusion Film Festival
description: NYU’s student-run festival dedicated to celebrating women and non-binary artists in film, TV, and new media.
address: NYU Tisch School of the Arts (Greenwich Village)

title: Girls to the Front: Nineties to Now
description: A showcase of trailblazing women directors from the ’90s indie film movement, alongside work from new filmmakers.

title: Ansa Edim: Is This Normal?
description: A one-woman storytelling show exploring a black woman’s experience navigating dating disasters and societal expectations.

title: Hush Hour: A Silent Book Club
description: An hour of quiet reading followed by optional socializing with fellow book lovers.

title: Collecting + Care: Exploring the BLK MKT Vintage Vault
description: Showcase stories behind items from a personal collection of black ephemera during a book launch event.

title: Selected Shorts: Dog Tales with Ana Gasteyer
description: An evening of fiction dedicated to dogs, hosted by Ana Gasteyer with performances by various stars.

title: Fantastic Fiction
description: The speculative-fiction reading series featuring various authors.

title: America, Let Me In: A Choose-Your-Own Immigration Story with Felipe Torres Medina
description: A launch/comedy show for Felipe Torres Medina's new book.

title: Eighth Annual One Liner Madness
description: A fast-paced, bracket-style one-liner joke tournament.

title: My Kinda Night! A Queer Variety Show
description: An evening filled with drag, cabaret, comedy, and more.
cost: Free admission (bring $ to tip the performers)

title: Friends with Caveats
description: A new weekly comedy show featuring various performances.

title: 12th Socially Relevant Film Festival
description: Socially relevant film content and human-interest stories that raise awareness of social problems and offer positive solutions. Various venues including The National Arts Club, Cinema Village, Tenri Cultural Institute, MRHS, and online.

title: Central Chamber Series
description: An evening concert featuring works by Mendelssohn and Brahms, performed by the Corland String Quartet and others.
cost: $20 general, free for students with ID

title: Pages + Pours: A Book Swap with a Twist
description: A book exchange for women, by women, held at Anaïs Wine Bar. Includes a glass of wine.
cost: $20 admission includes a glass of wine

title: Sweet Comedy Show: Sweet Unknown
description: Seth Herzog’s long-running comedy show with various guests.
